snoopy.blindnote: This snoRNA gene located with SNORA76 gene. There are no host gene. The EST is registered on Pan troglodytes. It include SNORD104. Another snoRNA database introduce it [Cluster of spliced ESTs (UniGene Hs.405444)]. http://www-snorna.biotoul.fr/plus.php?id=U104 It applears to be a polycistronic cluster. (20100630末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Vitali, P., Royo, H., Seitz, H., Bachellerie, J. P., Huttenhofer, A., and Cavaille, J. (2003). Identification of 13 novel human modification guide RNAs. Nucleic Acids Res 31, 6543-6551.
